page.title: 14TACOLNESTON PARISH COUNCIL
page.content:
{There are 7 members}of the Parish Council, which under normal circum- stances, meet 6 times a year. Typical items which have come under scrutiny this year are:- public footpaths, planning permission,stubble burning, grant requests & begging letters, trouble resulting from Discos at the Woodlands Club & Inter-Village Sports Competition.
{Money available}to the Council is raised through a Parish rate. A penny rate raises about Â£680. The Rate Precept for 1985/6 was 1.5p (Â£1027). The Council appoint trustees to the following charities: The Knipe Charity & The Fuel Allotment Charity. {Before the main agenda is dealt with {the Parishioners can express their {views during a Ten Minute period of {Public Participation.
